website_summaries.verdict: An easy go-to kit that introduces older toddlers to preschool concepts. Contains more engaging hands-on activities than other kits.
pros: Colorful kit includes hands-on fine motor activities as well as lessons in letters and numbers
Counting manipulatives and other tools based on family theme
cons: Check your kit to make sure you have all the right components

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Hands On Learners
customer_reviews.text: I have previously bought tge Teach My... series for my 2 yo but for the preschool prep kit I wanted something with more manipulatives and instructions. This kit comes with a dry erase workbook, instructions for leveling each activity and enough hands on items. The instructional does a great job of breaking down each learning or experience level for the materials and the dry erase workbook was a treat. This kit is best for 3-5 but my 2 yo can do some of the Level 1 stuff. This kit will last a while
customer_reviews.author: Imara219

customer_reviews.title: Such a great kit!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kit! There are so many uses for the pieces besides just what is suggested in the book. If you actually use it, this is one of the best buys you can make for a little. You could craft a similar kit at home, but this is a reasonable price and it's all laid out for you. The color dice game is still a favorite of my kiddo's two year after purchase, and she still regularly plays with the little people, buttons, and letters.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Many activities, great learning kit
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit! I did a lot of research before I purchased this and I am so happy with it. I am no teacher but this makes it so easy to plan lessons and there are tons of ideas In the included workbook and parent handbook. My son begs to do the activities and I feel it gives us quality time together. One thing I was worried about is in the other reviews it was mentioned that the shoelace string could not fit through the letters but my son and I have no problems with this so maybe it was just a defect because we have no issues with this at all.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Readiness Kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to prepare my daughter for VPK, which is essentially prek in Florida. She's going to barely miss the cut off, so I'll be enrollinging her in preschool. This is fantastic for learning handwriting skills, patterns, (which she already knew), and number/letter recognition.
customer_reviews.author: Benji

customer_reviews.title: Love this kit
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit! I have started using it with my 3yr old to introduce her to the basics and help her get ready for preschool. Lots of fun activities! All the topics are taught in games, my daughter is engaged and having a blast, and i don't feel overwhelmed or confined to a "curriculum" so to speak. The parents guide that comes with the kit is very helpful and full of ideas so you get the very most out of this. So far it's been great and I recommend for anyone wanting to prep for preschool or start homeschooling there little ones
customer_reviews.author: Silver

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit! They give you lots of ideas of different games you can play with the pieces, and the pieces themselves are very engaging. My daughter (just over 3) loves playing with the family pieces and lacing the letters and shapes. I think I'm going to buy the kindergarten one pretty soon because I think she'll be able to do some of that kit too. I would highly recommend this kit to anyone who wants something educational but that your kid will just think is a fun game!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: Missing several pieces
customer_reviews.text: Came missing several pieces. This is all that was in the box, but clearly the back shows many more items should be included. Extremely disappointed. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Student

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved this kit
customer_reviews.text: I am a homeschooling mom with a preschool aged child. I absolutely loved this kit. It had a lot of great learning tools that I found to be well made and educational and my son found to be a lot of fun and super interesting. We have had lots of fun learning together using these tools and toys.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Rae

customer_reviews.title: Hard to String the Letters
customer_reviews.text: Great educational product! Only problem (as states by another buyer) is that some of the letters are hard to string. A toddler would not be able to complete this alone, so be prepared to help them A LOT when on this activity. Tweezers might be useful for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Condition is great, however I suggest checking to make sure all the material is correct. We learned of missing alphabet pieces, while having duplicate letters in the middle of a lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: This is a fun game to the kids not learning!
customer_reviews.text: My kids BEG for this every day! When they see me get the box out they scream with excitement! I don't even think they know they are learning because they are just having too much fun! Luckily I see it and this item has helped immensely with number and letter recognition! My favorite thing in the box is the people because they can learn with them AND play family with them too! My daughter loves to play with the people. The wipe off books are amazing too! All in all I'd really give this a 10 star rating!
customer_reviews.author: Beauxregard

customer_reviews.title: So many activities easily adjusted to fit your child’s skill level
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with the many different activities that can be easily adjusted to meet your child’s skill level. I have a 3 year old and decided to go with this set, I’m so glad I did. If your child falls between the age range of two sets, I recommend going up. I would have given 5 stars if the set included a few pieces to replace the misplaced counters or buttons.
customer_reviews.author: K Black

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for learning at home
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great addition to our schooling. The instructions are easy to understand, and the additional activities include some I would not have thought of. All the products seem to be good quality, and have not broken or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: James D.

customer_reviews.title: Teaching with direction
customer_reviews.text: I taught my first kid everything he needed to know to be ready for kindergarten. This time I wanted to have a bit of direction cuz my 2nd kid doesn't respond to how I taught the first. This gives me new ideas and she is learning great! I also have the kindergarten set as well.
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Great Homeschooling tool but...
customer_reviews.text: Love this homeschooling activity for my 3.5 year old toddler. The challenge is the lacing letters - string will not go through some of the letters easily and my toddler was so upset to go through nearly the whole alphabet and the letter W would not lace through. Holes were too small or the waxy tip is not long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card Recipient

customer_reviews.title: Great, but missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I got this kit awhile ago, but just recently started using it. The activities are a lot of fun and my son has enjoyed it! However I discovered that we recieved 2 sets of the number cards, but no attribute buttons for teaching shapes and colors. This is disappointing as several of the activities require them. I have not been able to find a way to contact the company about this mix-up through their website.
customer_reviews.author: zachary l kilwein

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product images
customer_reviews.text: The product images shows this set comes with a "All Around The Playground" game. It did not. The set itself is as expected. Will update rating if customer service addresses this error.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for preschool prep
customer_reviews.text: Great resource for getting toddlers preschool ready. I thought about taking off one star because the lacing string doesn’t have a long enough aglet to make it through all of the lacing letter activity easily, but my kid loves all the activities and it’s really a valuable learning tool.
customer_reviews.author: Mandtastic

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Kit!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of great resources and things to do in this kit. Only complaint is that a handful of the letters are really hard to string on, even I couldn't get them on. Only reason I am giving four instead of five stars.
customer_reviews.author: JessDJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: The manipulative are perfect for my 3 year old. And, there is plenty of activities to keep my 5 year old engaged too! This is a great set. The box is very sturdy and all the materials can easily be stored in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate O

customer_reviews.title: Great, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, we kept the preschool going while stuck at home during the pandemic. So many combinations of learning. Our 3yo asks to 'play's school every day. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: LP03

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old nephew LOVES his ‘school’. All the different games trick him into thinking we are just playing but he already has learned so much and he has enjoyed doing so. The dry erase tracing is also a huge bonus- just erase and do again and again! Overall a great product!! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my 3 year old niece. She was so excited to open it!! Her older brothers are home schooled and her mother says this keeps her busy and entertained the whole time!!
customer_reviews.author: BD1128

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 3 year old twins as a "game" we could all engage in when we wanted some quiet indoor time. The kids LOVED it from the moment it arrived. The guide is excellent and the options for how to use them are endless. We engage with this set at least 4-5 times a week as a pre or post dinner activity.
customer_reviews.author: TripleJJJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Learning Kit
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old enjoys the kit and so do I! The Parent Guide provides various ways to use the supplies. I’ve even made up my own lessons and it’s helped my child learn while having fun.
customer_reviews.author: Nary

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: We just got the All Ready For Preschool Readiness Kit today in the mail. I'm already very impressed with it. My 4 year old couldn't wait to start doing the activities. It is great quality and worth the piece. This is perfect for homeschooling!
customer_reviews.author: J.L.L

customer_reviews.title: I'll be using it with my almost 3 year old to work on fine motor skills and introductory preschool skills
customer_reviews.text: I was actually very impressed with this little kit! I'll be using it with my almost 3 year old to work on fine motor skills and introductory preschool skills. It has a parent book with lots of ideas and easy to follow teaching instructions. Great bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: My son is 3 and loves this learning kit. My daughter was 1 1/2 and liked helping with it too!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: I love this! I highly recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2year old. Wasn't sure if it was too advanced for him. But it was VERY well worth it. He can't do everything yet but he will get there. I love this! I highly recommend this! I will be getting the kindergarten one as well when he is a bit older.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: So far learning has been fun!!
customer_reviews.text: My little is almost 3 and received this for Christmas. She has enjoyed playing with interactive pieces and is learning without realizing it's a learning tool. We have already spent time practicing shapes, colors, patterns, and sorting. No doubt this will help get her ready for preschool and keep learning fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, but not as much to do as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: My son just turned 3 and he loves it, but has completed almost all the activities in 3 days. They are fun, but he has lost interest pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing both guides and some of the alphabets.
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed about the box was a sticker on the outside that says it was inspected by Amazon. So, I was surprised to open the box and see that not only were some of the alphabet missing, but both the guides were missing as well. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great Learning Tool
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asks to do her activity book all the time. She has fun and learns at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: TMD2

customer_reviews.title: Great Preschool Kit
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit. Lots of thoughtful activity options with a minimal amount of clutter. I am glad I purchased this as part of my “homeschool supplies” for my 3.5 year since she will be home this year due to COVID.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: My little loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 3 and she loves this! We play togather or she will play by herself. But she loves the little toys inside.
customer_reviews.author: Mcarpenter42017

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used twice and got bored. She completed the set in about an hour. She is 3.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Champion

customer_reviews.title: Homeschool kit for toddler
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves this kit!! Very easy for her to learn with this
customer_reviews.author: Valentina Chernikov

customer_reviews.title: Already love it
customer_reviews.text: We just received the product and my almost 3 year old already loves it! She is obsessed with the people counters and loves the grabber! I absolutely recommend this product. I am so happy we bought this! It is a great addition to our homeschooling.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Perfect value
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this kit, she will ask daily to do the activities. I feel like it is a great supplement to preschool workbooks
customer_reviews.author: mel15

customer_reviews.title: Love this kit!
customer_reviews.text: Love the options and clarity of instructions in the kit! Great!
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this kit
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this kit! We have a very active 2 year old who wants to disrupt his 5 year old brothers schoolwork. The materials are high quality (so he can't rip, chew, or destroy them) and have enough variety to keep him entertained. I feel like he is also growing into some of the activities so it is providing new ways to play! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for grandkids
customer_reviews.text: This was given a thumbs up by my daughter who is a teacher! Great gift for grandkids! Never too early to begin teaching concepts st home!
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: We are very impressed with the kit so far, my son has spent the morning loving this kit (he is a two year old but advanced for his age so we opted for the preschool kit instead of the toddler one and are glad we did!)
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It made learning enjoyable for my one year old
customer_reviews.author: Craig M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: Using this kit with 3-yr-old, 4-yr-old and autistic 6 yr old. It's a great set with endless possibilities as we create tasks over and above the ones in the teaching manual.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for homeschooling my 3 year old. The included activities are engaging and so fun. The included parent guide requires no prep and is easy to follow. With some creativity, the possibilities for using the included materials are endless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great learning resource
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my 4 year old loves all the activities.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son was very excited when this arrived. He loves it and we cannot wait to work with him!
customer_reviews.author: A.Burris

customer_reviews.title: Fun learning activities
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun activities/ games with extensions. My daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie E. Bittle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and fun
customer_reviews.text: My son learned the color in one day with this!! I love it, all the family have fun with him!! I totally recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Thaisa Fontao Gottardi Guimaraes

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this set!
customer_reviews.text: We are homeschoolers and I highly recommend this set. Plenty of activity ideas in the parent book, some I can challenge my 5k-1st grader with as well! Pieces are really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: L. V. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 3yr old and he absolutely loves waking up in the mornings and learning new things each day!!!! Definitely worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son loves this! There are a lot of activities! Even suggestions for activities to do outside of this set to incorporate the same learning objective.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Freerksen

customer_reviews.title: I was super excited to get this for my preschooler but it ...
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get this for my preschooler but it was packaged incorrectly! 🙁 Instead of getting a package of little people I got two packages of the alphabet. Slightly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy S

customer_reviews.title: Tons of learning
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest. A lot of ideas for different games. Bingo, learning patterns and writing ABCs and so much more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves using this kit. There are many activities that are her learning and entertained. She takes it out and asks to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great resource!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for the price! Lots of activities for little hands.
customer_reviews.author: ab

customer_reviews.title: ... teach my son at home and this is a great
customer_reviews.text: I plan to teach my son at home and this is a great start
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 & 4 year old love this product. It has something for each of them even though they are learning on different levels.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffiny B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves working with this, especially threading the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen K.

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't too sure when I ordered this, but the almost 3 year old and I love this! He likes to trace the letters, use the people to make patterns, strong the letters, and roll the dice. There are so many fun activities and he has been learning so much! I'm a former preschool teacher and think this kit is a great idea for parents to use at home and would use the pieces in my classroom when I go back.
customer_reviews.author: Aldarnall88

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been using this all year with my now 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this all year with my now 5 year old. Unfortunately, the only thing he really likes about it is the portion where you roll the dice and he has to do a physical activity. I wouldn’t be too bothered about that, except the foam dice came with a big bite mark in it. Oh well. I read previous reviews and saw this could happen, so I’ve wiped it off with a Clorox wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Brittany

customer_reviews.title: He leads his way through his favorite parts of the activity book and loves learning new ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 year old son brings out the box and asks me if I want to play games with him. He leads his way through his favorite parts of the activity book and loves learning new things with the toys, especially the little people figures. I saw some people complained about lack of storage bags but we separated the toys into zip lock bags that we keep inside the original box. It's a great way to bond with and teach my oldest while his little brother naps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very great preschool kit
customer_reviews.text: Very great preschool kit, my three year old loves it and it gas alot included for the price... It even has a parents guide for help and tips while using the kit with your child! We use it very often and would (have) recommend to others! :)
customer_reviews.author: Littlemomma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: My son who is 3 years of age, absolutely LOVES this! The activities are so much fun and a perfect way of getting a child moving and thinking.
customer_reviews.author: Zodiac

customer_reviews.title: Great product but may be missing some pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit to help begin teaching my toddler letters, colors, shapes and motor skills. My only issue is everything came in their separate sealed bags but i somehow got two letter O's and not a letter N. Disappointed when we work on the alphabet.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: This is great, my only complaint is the family they included ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great, my only complaint is the family they included cats which I was so excited that pets were included, but there are no dogs! I now see that in the picture, so didn't notice it when I purchased this. I likely would have still purchased this item, but it just doesn't make any sense to me that dogs would not be included when cats are included. Cats and dogs being the most popular pets in a family. We happen to have 2 dogs and a cat.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: Needs a bag to store the pieces
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves all the little pieces, maybe a bit too much since they seem to be everywhere! A bag to keep all the pieces in would be a great addition to this set.
customer_reviews.author: Anchored

customer_reviews.title: great combination!
customer_reviews.text: I use it when I tutor one of my students. She loves it ! Great combination of different activities that are appropriate for preschoolers and the guide helps to go step by step
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: What a great pack! i was amazed at the quality! i was really surprised at all the fun activities with clear instructions! we bring out at least one thing every night! The only small complain i have is that i wished that the kit included more shapes rectangle pentagon etc.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Easy learning!!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my e yr old jumped straight in woth no issues!
customer_reviews.author: KBear17

customer_reviews.title: One happy toddler and momma!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this kit! Some of it is too advanced for him but we have created our own activities! It's become part of our daily routine! When he sees the box he gets so excited and can't wait to play with the little people. He just turned two so this is probably great for the recommended age range. My son knows his colors, ABCs, and shapes really well that's why we opted out of the toddler kit. This kit makes me want to get it though. He just loves it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Vgray91

customer_reviews.title: Great preschool learning kit all rolled into one!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little kit for preschoolers (just make sure to keep your pieces together...my little one likes to run off with them :)). Make sure you read the parents guide. There are a lot of activity suggestions geared towards the different domains you would like your preschooler to have mastery. This was very well done and very economical. I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.author: MommyB

customer_reviews.title: We are doing home preschool and it takes a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: We are doing home preschool and it takes a lot to excite my 3 year old about learning. She looks forward to this part the most. Update: I dropped it down to 3 stars because for some reason the wood had warped on the top-side of it, so now it closes a little funky. Other than that, we still enjoy using it a lot. Even my 21 month old gets into it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Very small and broke super fast. Didn't even make it around the neighborhood on a walk with child care children
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Learning Resources All Ready for Preschool Readiness Kit, Homeschool, Counting & Fine Motor Skills Toy, Ages 3+
product_meta.description: Prepare children for preschool with this comprehensive kit. Target essential preschool skills including counting, alphabet, color identification, and shape recognition. Featuring a family theme, this specially designed kit includes an assortment of colorful manipulatives, a write-and-wipe Activity Book for children, and a 32-page Guide created just for parents. It all conveniently stores in a handy storage box.
feature_bullets: VIBRANTLY designed around a kid-friendly family theme, this kit includes preschool essentials conveniently bundled in a sturdy carrying case
DESIGNED to help teach numbers, counting, alphabet, colors, shapes, fine motor skills and more
A comprehensive collection of activities and hands-on tools for preschoolers
Includes a 32 page Parent Guide structured upon an easy-to-follow Ready, Set, Go lesson framework

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars279 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
